articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Newly Built Central Mushroom Research Institute
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Newly Built Central Mushroom Research Institute
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the newly built Central Mushroom Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences.
					 The Institute with a total plottage of at least 6 100 square meters has its building, mushroom growing rooms for research and raw materials store, etc. It is a mushroom research center built according to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un making a new history of industrialization of mushroom growing.
					
					 After going round the room dedicated to the history of the institute, he dropped in at different places including various research rooms, laboratories, e-library, products storing room and mushroom growing grounds to learn in detail about its construction and research work.
					
					 He was pleased that not only different research rooms and labs and mushroom growing grounds but corridors leading to offices, main building and annexes, vestibule and resting place and all other aspects have been built in a peculiar style to be impeccable.
					
					 He noted that the institute has a very important duty and role to perform in thoroughly carrying out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on turning the DPRK into a huge producer of mushroom.
					
					 There is now a brisk drive for mushroom production in different parts of the country in hearty response to the appeal of the Party and large capacity mushroom farms and production bases are now under construction there, he said, adding that scientific research should be given precedence in order to put mushroom production on an industrial and scientific basis.
					
					 He underscored the need for the institute to study and round off varieties of edible and medical mushroom growing technologies, intensify the work for solving the issue of substrate suited to the topographical peculiarities and satisfactorily produce and ensure spores necessary for mushroom growing.
					
					 Calling for providing proper scientific and technological guidance to the mushroom producing units, he underlined the need to consolidate the data base related to the research and cultivation of mushroom and actively apply advanced technology and widely disseminate it among the relevant units.
					
					 He called on the officials and researchers of the institute to register shining scientific research successes and thus turn the institute into a scientific research center to bring substantial benefits to the people.
					
					 Recalling that he gave an instruction on completing the construction of the institute till the anniversary of the party, he noted a unit of the KPA carried out it without fail as the KPA considers it a bounden duty to implement the order of the supreme commander at any cost under any circumstances. He noted with great satisfaction that this is the true nature of the revolutionary army and he felt proud of assigning the task to the People's Army.
					
					 Very pleased to visit the institute, he had a photo session with commanding officers of the unit which took part in the construction and officials of the institute.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Pak Thae Song and Hwang Pyong So, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Military Confab against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Military Confab against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean top military officials recently held the 45th annual security consultative meeting in Seoul. They adopted a "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed at a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK and discussed the issue of extending the period for the transfer of the wartime operational control and the issue of strengthening the capabilities for jointly coping with the DPRK under the pretext of "nuclear and ballistic missile threats" from the DPRK.
					 The "tailored deterrence strategy" is a dangerous nuclear war scenario envisaging the preemptive attack on the DPRK with the mobilization of all military means including the nuclear weapons if there is even the slightest sign of the possible use of nuclear weapons and missiles by the DPRK.
					
					 The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in a statement on Monday denounced the military confab as an extremely serious provocation to scuttle the process for dialogue and peace, escalate tensions and ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to ignite a nuclear war while talking about "sign of the use of nuclear weapons" by the DPRK on the Korean Peninsula, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The military confab for aggression has created a touch-and-go situation in which an accidental case or a misjudgment may lead to a nuclear war.
					
					 It is illogical for the Park Geun Hye regime to cry out for "dismantlement of nuclear weapons" and "denuclearization" of the DPRK while openly revealing its scheme for a nuclear war against the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet regime are trying hard to put political and military pressure on the DPRK, deter the DPRK's offensive for dialogue and peace and escalate the tensions through frantic nuclear war provocation moves and thus attain without fail their aggression purposes. This only heightens the indignation of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Should the U.S. and the puppet forces opt for the provocation of a nuclear war against the DPRK, defying its warnings, it will resolutely counter them.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the puppet forces should not run amuck, clearly aware of the spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to annihilate enemies.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Commemorate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Commemorate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Monday in commemoration of the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, labor innovators and other people.
					
					 A report was made by Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK. 
					
					 The election of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK marked a political event of particular significance in the development of the WPK and the Korean revolution and a great auspicious event of the nation as it powerfully demonstrated the might of harmonious whole between the leader and the people, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK to be an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people and steered the revolution and construction along the road of one victory after another with his outstanding idea and tested leadership for over half a century, performing immortal exploits on behalf of the country and  its people, the times and history.
					
					 The WPK is a revolutionary party firmly based on the leader's ideological system and leadership system, a mother party serving the people after forming harmonious whole with them and an invincible party having a strong political and military groundwork. This is the true picture of the WPK that has grown strong under his leadership.
					
					  All service personnel and people have grown strong in thinking and faith thanks to the dynamic ideological and political work of the WPK and the single-minded unity of the whole party and army and all people around the headquarters of the revolution has grown as firm as a rock and this resulted in the emergence of a powerful driving force of the revolution. 
					
					 The WPK's Songun politics helped ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula, usher in a new phase of the movement for national reunification advancing in the idea of "By our nation itself", boost the international solidarity with the Korean revolution and remarkably promote the country's relations with other countries.
					
					 His idea and cause of the Juche-oriented party building have been carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un at a new higher level.
					
					 Kim Jong Un formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal guiding idea for the party and revolution through his brilliant ideological and theoretical activities and proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on it as the supreme programme of the party. This is the great achievement that provides a sure guarantee for the development of the WPK and the final accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The reporter called on all party members, service personnel and people to consolidate the party shining with the august names of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and steadily increase its leadership role and thus accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of the Korean revolution as it is dynamically advancing, flying the flag of the Juche-oriented party led by Kim Jong Un generation after generation, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK, concluded the reporter.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Russia
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A DPRK friendship delegation led by So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the Korea-Russia Friendship Association, left here on Monday to visit Russia.
					 Meanwhile, the delegation of the Institute for Foreign Policy and Strategic Studies of Vietnam headed by Director General Hoang Anh Tuan went back on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Members of the mission of the WFP in the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues in humblest reverence and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Meanwhile, a delegation of the Thailand International Development Cooperation Agency led by Director General Piroon Laismit also paid floral tribute to the statues on Monday. 
					
					 The delegation arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Mosaic Depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected
articles.content:
Mosaic Depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A mosaic "Invincible Single-minded Unity Will Last Forever" was erected at the entrance to Ryonmot-dong, Pyongyang.
					 It depicts smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who wish Songun Korea bright future.
					
					 It also shows the proud appearance of the DPRK in which their noble desire is being translated into reality and the firm faith and will of all service personnel and people to remain true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu in high esteem as the sun of Juche down through generations.
					
					 A ceremony of unveiling the mosaic took place on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Ri Il Hwan, secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and working people and school youth and children in Sosong District.
					
					 The participants placed floral baskets before the mosaic and paid tribute.
					
					 An address was made on the occasion.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the mosaic, being briefed on it.

articles.title: Sportspersons Thankful for WPK's Loving Care
articles.content:
Sportspersons Thankful for WPK's Loving Care
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Sportspersons and coaches of merit and their families moved to a new apartment built on the bank of the River Pothong in Pyongyang. Every flat in the apartment is fully furnished.
					 They expressed their excitements to KCNA.
					
					 Boxer Pak Kyong Ok, 64 kg-category champion at the 7th World Women's Boxing Championships, said that born into a worker's family, I was awarded with the title of People's Athlete and moved to a new house beyond my imagination under the warm care of the Workers' Party of Korea. To reward this loving care, I'm fully determined to prove successful in the World Women's Boxing Championships next year.
					
					 Kim Myong Hun, father of boxer Kim Hyang Ok, the winner of the 5th World Women's Boxing Championships, said:
					
					 I had done farm work for my life in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province. As soon as I got the news my daughter was assigned a new house, I came here to see her luxurious house never dreamt of. I have no words to express my lots of thanks.
					
					 Ri Chun Hui, wife of senior coach Kim Chol Ung, said:
					
					 My husband led the DPRK team to victory in the mixed doubles of the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual events). 
					
					 Every room is perfect. When I look around the kitchen, it is fully equipped for housewife. I am deeply moved by the warm care of the WPK.
					
					 Among newcomers in the apartment is Kim Chun Hui, coach of the Kigwancha Sports Team whose husband is People's Athlete Im Yong Su. Kim trained female weightlifter Rim Jong Sim up to a 69-kg category winner at London Olympics. Her husband Im also proved successful at the 72nd World Men's Weightlifting Championships and other international contests. 
					
					 Kim and Im expressed their determination to make active contribution to realizing the WPK's idea on building a sports power by training more competent weightlifters.
					
					 All sportspersons of the country, inspired by the loving care of the WPK, are unanimously resolved to achieve more successful results at international games.

articles.title: Fuel Pump Branch Factory Goes Operational
articles.content:
Fuel Pump Branch Factory Goes Operational 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The new Fuel Pump Branch Factory of the Huichon Precision Machine Plant went operational.
					 The factory has been put on an integral production system. It has all production processes ranging from latest precision cutting and machining equipment, mainly ultra-modern CNC-based equipment, to equipment for testing and measuring, packing and trademark fixing.
					
					 The appearance of a base for the production of precision machines equivalent to a machine plant makes it possible to mass-produce high quality fuel pumps and plunger and jet orifice, etc. and thus contribute to the development of the nation's rolling stock industry.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony was held on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Jon Sung Hun, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Jong Guk, minister of Machine-building Industry, Kim Chun Sop, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Tok Hun, chairman of the provincial people's committee, and others.
					
					 The participants went round the production process at the end of the ceremony.

articles.title: Medical Herb Gathering Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Medical Herb Gathering Brisk in DPRK 
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Medical herb gathering gains momentum in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in September and October each year.
					 In this period, various species of medical herbs are planted and gathered throughout the country.
					
					 The Koksan County People's Committee in North Hwanghae Province calls upon the county's medical workers to actively turn out in the campaign for gathering medical herbs.
					
					 In particular, the committee makes big efforts to raise awareness of responsibility among medical officials.
					
					 The Tokhung-ri People's Hospital and Songrim-ri Clinic in the county now stand in the van in the campaign, already having gathered a great deal of herbs, including barrenwort, crataegi fructus and shizandra. 
					
					 The same is true of other healthcare units in the county.
					
					 The Nyongwon County People's Committee in South Phyongan Province is directing big efforts to gathering wild herbs.
					
					 Healthcare units in the county have rightly selected the species of medical herbs of the season, while gathering those herbs for the treatment of patients ahead of others.
					
					 The committee is also paying deep attention to storing the herbs in safety.

articles.title: National Software Exhibition in Field of Education Closes
articles.content:
National Software Exhibition in Field of Education Closes
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The 14th national software exhibition in the educational field closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Monday.
					 Kim Il Sung University, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Huichon University of Technology, Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering and Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies came first in the exhibition of the panel of information technology at educational institutions. They made successes in putting education on an IT basis including the system of educational administration and management, the placing of libraries on an IT basis, the establishment of a radio network, tele-mechanical educational system and computer-aided examination system.
					
					 More than 100 programs for simulation experiment and practice and computer-aided educational programs and others were highly appreciated in the exhibition of the panel of software. 
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were officials concerned, teachers, researchers and students of universities and schools at all levels who presented programs to the exhibition. 
					
					 The results of examination by the jury were announced and citations and registration cards of programs were awarded to the successful units and participants. 
					
					 Jon Kuk Man, vice-chairman of the Education Commission, made a closing address.

articles.title: DPRK Woman Weightlifter Bags Gold Medal
articles.content:
DPRK Woman Weightlifter Bags Gold Medal
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK players are proving successful at the 6th East Asian Games now under way in Tianjin, China.
					 Jong Chun Mi came first in total points by lifting 97 kg in snatch and 129 kg in jerk. She thus bagged a gold medal in the 63 kg category of women's weightlifting event held on Monday.
					
					 Woman weightlifter Kim Su Ryon placed second in the women's 53 kg category event and Kim Chun Mi finished second in the 5 000 m race, winning a silver medal.

articles.title: DPRK Men's Football Team Defeats Japanese Rival 2:1
articles.content:
DPRK Men's Football Team Defeats Japanese Rival 2:1
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The men's football matches began as part of the 6th East Asian Games in Tianjin, China. 
					 The football matches brought together teams of the DPRK, China, Hong Kong of China, Japan and south Korea. The teams will hold league matches to decide standings. 
					
					 The DPRK team defeated Japanese rival 2:1 on October 6.
					
					 The DPRK team will hold the second match with the south Korean team on October 10.

articles.title: History of First Homeland Party Organization Remembered
articles.content:
History of First Homeland Party Organization Remembered
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Turu Hill, located in Onsong County, North Hamgyong Province, is associated with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in forming the first homeland party organization and guiding a meeting of political workers and heads of underground revolutionary organizations.
					 In the wake of having formed the Society for Rallying Comrades in July Juche 19 (1930), a parent body of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Kim Il Sung made big efforts to form party organizations under the society in the northern areas of Korea along the River Tuman and Manchuria.
					
					 As part of the efforts, he convened a meeting on Turu Hill on October 1, 1930 to announce the formation of a party organization, the first of its kind in the homeland at that time.
					
					 At the meeting, he delivered a historic speech "On the Immediate Tasks of the Homeland Party Organization", setting forth the tasks for the party organization in Onsong area.
					
					 Kim Il Sung in his reminiscences "With the Century" said: "The formation of a party organization in the Onsong area was the start of the laying of the foundation for party building and an important turning point in promoting the anti-Japanese struggle of the people in the homeland."
					
					 The formation of the first homeland party organization was of great significance in building up a basis of the WPK founded after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule and leading the anti-Japanese struggle for national liberation to victory.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at S. Korea's Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at S. Korea's Park Geun Hye Group 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Now the hard-won circumstances for dialogue between the north and the south of Korea is taking reversed, due to Park Geun Hye group of south Korea keen on confrontation for a war against the DPRK.
					 Some days ago, her group announced the "principal plan for the development of the south-north relations", the keynote of which is to reduce the inter-Korean declarations, a milestone for Korea's reunification, into dead documents and openly advocate the confrontation of social systems.
					
					 They even went so far as to denounce the operation of the Kaesong Industrial Zone as someone's "source of money making", while checking the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang. Worse still, they described the reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south as a fruition of their "theory of principle" to get on the nerve of the north.
					
					 What is more surprising is that the south Korean puppet regime, together with the United States, officially confirmed and made public the "tailored deterrence strategy", which is aimed at preemptive nuclear strike at the north.  
					
					 Pak Yong Gol, a company commander of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards from Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "Generosity does not work with Park Geun Hye and her group.
					
					It has been revealed that they have no will to have dialogues with the north from the start of their assumption of power.
					
					Deadly punishment should be brought down upon such a kind of traitors."
					
					 Han Chol, a platoon leader of the guards, said:
					
					"It is evident that Park Geun Hye is the worst traitor to the nation.
					
					Nothing will come out from such a devil without the policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen."
					
					 Ryu Kil Nam, a Pyongyang citizen, said,
					
					 "I feel hatred for the group of Park Geun Hye as they introduced a U.S. nuclear-powered carrier into south Korea to overpower the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK is fully prepared both for dialogue and war."

articles.title: S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drills Targeted at DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drills Targeted at DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet war-like forces plan to stage the DPRK-targeted joint naval maneuvers in the East Sea of Korea with a great many warships such as nuclear carrier George Washington task force and Aegis of the south Korean puppet navy involved.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday observes as follows:
					
					 That the U.S. and its south Korean puppet trigger-happy forces seek the joint military exercises with a nuclear carrier involved is the revelation of the bellicose attempt to escalate the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the extreme pitch of tension, prevent the dialogue and peace from progressing and attain the ambition for invading the DPRK by openly threatening it with nukes.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime plans to deploy the nuclear carrier in waters off south Korea in collusion with the U.S. in a futile bid to frighten the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK will never be browbeaten by it or any other things more powerful than it.
					
					 It has all means and forces to cope with any adventurous nuclear war scenarios of the U.S. and the puppet forces. It is fully ready to show its mettle to the bellicose forces running amuck by counting on the nuclear carrier.
					
					 The regime would be well advised to be well aware that it is fated to meet the complete ruin which can never be recovered by the nuclear carrier and anything else more powerful than it if it continues pursuing reckless military provocations against the DPRK, backed by its American master.

articles.title: "Confrontation Accompanied by Dialogue" Touted by S. Korean Authorities Denounced by Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Confrontation Accompanied by Dialogue" Touted by S. Korean Authorities Denounced by Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities have become evermore desperate in their moves for a war and confrontation while viciously slandering the dignity and social system of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Their attitude to the inter-Korean relations is, in a word, a serious arrogant stance to hurt the dignity and image of the DPRK with the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" and realize the treacherous ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 The puppet conservative authorities' persistent pursuit of the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" is no more than the sinister intention to deny the north-south declarations, escalate the confrontation with compatriots and bring the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophic phase.
					
					 They are talking about the implementation of the north-south declarations but they are working hard to totally abrogate them.
					
					 The DPRK has made broad-minded and sincere efforts to create atmosphere of dialogue and cooperation. This is aimed to preserve the fundamental principle of the north-south declarations and promote the implementation, not for putting forward the demand of one side.
					
					 The "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" touted by the puppet conservative forces is the revelation of the sordid intention of those who seek to realize the criminal daydream of the "unification of social systems" in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The present ruling forces claimed "dialogue" not to promote the nation's reconciliation and cooperation but to escalate confrontation.
					
					 As soon as she took the office, she pursued the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" under the pretext of the "confidence-building process" while asserting that "drain on resources is fake peace" and calling for "promotion of dialogue based on security".
					
					 The puppet conservative authorities are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can pass the buck for the deteriorated inter-Korean relations to the DPRK and get rid of worsening ruling crisis by pursuing the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue."

articles.title: S. Korea's Invectives against DPRK Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea's Invectives against DPRK Denounced 
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The puppet ministry of Unification of south Korea in a recent "statement of its spokesman" let out such invectives against the DPRK as "regret," "unreasonable behavior" and polite demeanor". It ridiculously urged the DPRK to "abandon nuclear program", saying it will not be helpful. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says that the south Korean authorities should have thought about the serious impact their invectives will have on the north-south relations before fining fault with the DPRK, if they had even an iota of reason. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities slandered the dignity and social system of the dialogue partner. Not content with this, they have resorted to the military provocations to hurt the fellow countrymen while crying out for bolstering "deterrence to cope with the north" after introducing nuclear-powered carrier of an outside force. They are even disturbing hard-won atmosphere of dialogue under the signboard of "theory of principle". Are these "efforts for confidence-building?"
					
					 It is the height of impudence that those maniacs who go through fire and water to hurt the fellow countrymen talk about "mutual respect".
					
					 What is intolerable is that the south Korean authorities bitterly slandered the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defense and its strategic line, jabbering "dismantlement of nuclear program" and "change".
					
					 With no rhetoric can they check the just cause of the DPRK and cover up their sinister colors as a despicable nuclear war servant for outside forces and confrontational maniacs. 
					
					 They can never justify their traitorous crimes against reunification of chilling the hard-won atmosphere for mending the north-south relations and escalating confrontation.

articles.title: Japan Should Drop Ambition for Reinvasion: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Should Drop Ambition for Reinvasion: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The governor of Kyoto Prefecture, Japan recently expressed his willingness to introduce an early warning radar of the U.S. forces into the region. Meanwhile, the mayor of Takashima, Japan clarified the stand that as the serving mayor he is not opposed to the Japan-U.S. joint drill to be staged with the involvement of MV-22 Osprey of the U.S. Marines. This brought to a temporary pause the contended radar and the drill issues between Japan and the U.S.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese authorities accepted the U.S. demand in disregard of the Japanese people's mindset, an indication to realize the ambition for turning Japan into a military giant and making reinvasion with the backing of the U.S. at the sacrifice of the security and interests of their people.
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of the Japanese militarists to invade Asia with armed forces and revive the past "imperial era". To this end, they have given spurs to turning Japan into a military giant. They have bolstered armed forces and increased the military capability of the "Self-Defense Forces", crying out for "military role" as befits an "economic power" in the international arena. They have mass-produced and deployed military hardware, launched military satellites and pushed ahead with the establishment of MD by allotting a huge amount of funds.
					
					 Reinvasion will lead Japan to self-destruction. It is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can realize the sordid ambition with the help of a big country.
					
					 It had better drop the foolish ambition for reinvasion.

articles.title: Illegal Surveillance on Civilians Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Illegal Surveillance on Civilians Disclosed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The puppet Ministry of Health and Welfare in south Korea perpetrated an illegal surveillance on civilians.
					 This was disclosed by a lawmaker affiliated with the Health and Welfare Committee of the "National Assembly" on Oct. 1.
					
					 According to him, some days ago the ministry distributed an official document having detailed points which call for surveying political party activities of inhabitants in cities and provinces across south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is mobilizing even government machine for establishing a fascist dictatorial system, not content with hurling the Intelligence Service and other security mechanisms for suppression into illegal surveillance. This is a clear indication that the south Korean regime is a horde of despicable political gangsters and a gang of human rights abusers and depraved hoodlums.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Stunned by IS's Illegal Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Stunned by IS's Illegal Acts
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- More facts about the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service's illegal interference in the "presidential election" last year were disclosed, stunning public.
					 This was disclosed by an ex-agent of the psychological warfare team of the IS who appeared as a witness at the trial of Won Se Hun, former director of the IS, held at the Seoul Central District Court on Sept. 30.
					
					 He admitted that he posted on website articles critical of An Chol Su and Mun Jae In, "presidential" candidates, in the run-up to the election.
					
					 He testified that he posted on website an article slandering the representative of the Unified Progressive Party and others.
					
					 He also testified that a higher institution instructed the team to post on website videos praising Lee Myung Bak in a bid to calm down the anti-"government" spirit and the IS bribed people to conduct cyber activities against progressive forces.

articles.title: Public Employee of S. Korea Sentenced to Prison Term
articles.content:
Public Employee of S. Korea Sentenced to Prison Term
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The puppet Chongju District Court of south Korea on October 5 sentenced to a prison term a public employee on charge that he posted on website an article praising the DPRK.
					 The court took this action for violating the "Security Law." It brought against him the charge that he posted on website an article praising the socialist system in the DPRK in 2003 and possessed "enemy-benefiting literature."
					
					 This is part of the puppet conservative group's fascist repressive campaign to quell the desire to achieve reunification through alliance with the north growing stronger among south Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Professors Publish Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
S. Korean Professors Publish Declaration on Situation
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Professors at Pusan Teachers College in south Korea published a declaration on the situation on October 4.
					 South Korean society is rapidly going backward after the present regime took office, the declaration said.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is creating an undesirable situation reminiscent of that during the "yusin" dictatorship, it charged.
					
					 It has been disclosed that the last "presidential election" was illegally conducted due to the unreasonable interference by the Intelligence Service, police and politicians of the ruling party, it noted.
					
					 The declaration accused the present regime of disturbing the probe into the truth about this.
					
					 It urged the chief executive to make a formal apology for the case of the IS.
					
					 If the authorities persist in their acts in violation of democracy, they will face a stern judgment from the people, it warned.

articles.title: Brazilian and Nigerian Organizations Praise Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Brazilian and Nigerian Organizations Praise Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and Nigerian organizations posted special write-ups on their websites on September 29 and October 1 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website an article titled "Eternal General Secretary of the WPK" illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article said that it is by no means something symbolic that the Korean people hold Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK in high esteem, adding that his idea and lines serve as permanent guidelines of the WPK.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 The idea and theory of General Secretary Kim Jong Il serve as immutable truth and a permanent banner of victory for the WPK and Korean people making a general advance for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving a final victory.
					
					 The immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by leading the WPK for decades serve as a permanent driving force powerfully encouraging the Korean people in their cause of socialism.
					
					 He developed the WPK into a mother party which achieved a harmonious whole with the popular masses and serves them and an invincible party having steel-strong discipline and fighting capability.
					
					 For the Korean people Kim Jong Il precisely means the WPK and it represents the motherly care as it is responsible for the destiny and future of the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is always alive with the ever-victorious WPK guiding the general march of the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article dealing with the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into a popular party and a mother party.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Observed Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included a celebration meeting in Mexico, a lecture in Romania and a friendly meeting and a film show in Benin held on September 30 and October 1.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched the Korean film "Monument to Party Founding".
					
					 The chairman of a city cultural and sports committee of Mexico said in his speech that leader Kim Jong Il closely united the whole party in the monolithic idea and will and pursued Songun politics, frustrating the imperialist allied forces' moves for aggression and interference and defending socialism while leading the WPK for decades.
					
					 He stressed that President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's noble idea of party building and exploits are shedding more brilliant rays and the might of the WPK is growing stronger thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania noted that Kim Il Sung was the great leader who set a shining example in the building of the Juche-type revolutionary party, adding that Kim Jong Il who carried forward the idea and cause of the President authored a lot of works giving perfect answers to all issues arising in the party building and activities, thereby providing a solid foundation for developing the WPK. 
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il was the most experienced statesman.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and thoroughly embodied it in the revolution and construction. He victoriously advanced the Korean revolution, believing in the strength of the people and depending on it, he added.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Benin.

articles.title: Ethiopian Personages Support Struggle of Korean People for National Reunification
articles.content:
Ethiopian Personages Support Struggle of Korean People for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Ethiopia from September 24 to October 2 on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The speakers recalled  at the round-table talks that leader Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing the former, with his ardent patriotism, immensely broad-minded caliber and great magnanimity, highly praising him as the father of the Korean nation who devoted his all to the reunification of the country.
					
					 They assailed the south Korean authorities for driving the relations between the north and the south into a catastrophe again though they had favorably developed thanks to the positive efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop chilling the desire of the nation for reconciliation and unity if they truly stand for improved inter-Korean relations and reunification, they urged.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would meet all challenges and surely achieve the reunification of the country under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised by British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Sept. 17 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the demise of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 It said that although she passed away she has been praised as a mother of Korea who brought up the great sun of Songun. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 She embarked upon the road of revolution in her early days and joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army organized and led by President Kim Il Sung and devoted her all to the liberation of the country.
					
					 In the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle she was well known as an example of a genuine revolutionary who protected and defended Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically and at the cost of her life, a female partisan general and a sharp shooter.
					
					 After the liberation she put her heart and soul into building the new democratic Korea, bolstering the revolutionary armed forces and firmly strengthening the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					
					 She brought up leader Kim Jong Il as a great revolutionary, an immortal contribution to the completion of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Her revolutionary exploits will remain long in the hearts of progressive humankind and followers of the Juche idea and Songun idea.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia conspiracion EE.UU.-Sur de Corea para la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia conspiracion EE.UU.-Sur de Corea para la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, las cabecillas de la capa militar de Estados Unidos y del Sur de Corea sostuvieron en Seul la 45a reunion consultiva anual de seguridad.
					En esa ocasion, pretextando la "amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles balisticos" de la RPDC, aprobaron la "estrategia del disuasivo en forma de ajuste" encaminada al ataque preventivo nuclear anti-RPDC y debatieron otros temas, tales como la nueva posposicion del mando operacional en el tiempo de guerra y el mejoramiento de la capacidad de enfrentamiento conjunto.
					
					Particularmente, la susodicha "estrategia" deviene un peligroso guion de guerra nuclear, segun el cual se podra atacar preventivamente a la RPDC movilizando todos los medios militares, inclusive armas nucleares, si se detecta alguna senal de uso de armas nucleares y misiles por ella.
					
					En su nota publicada hoy, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) denuncia que la presente conspiracion militar del imperio yanqui y la banda de los titeres surcoreanos deviene una severa provocacion que destruye el proceso de dialogo y paz en la Peninsula Coreana, agrava la tension y hacer estallar la guerra nuclear, y prosigue: 
					
					EE.UU. trata de provocar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana hablando del "indicio de uso de armas nucleares" por la RPDC.
					
					Debido al presente complot militar de caracter agresivo, se crea en la Peninsula Coreana una crisis muy tirante de que pueda estallarse una guerra nuclear con cualquier accidente casual y minimo error en juicio.
					
					Es ilogico el hecho de que los compinches de Park Geun-hye abogaran por la "renuncia de armas nucleares" de la RPDC y la "desnuclearizacion" exponiendo abiertamente su intento de provocar junto con su amo gringo la guerra nuclear de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					El imperio y los belicistas titeres tratan de lograr, cueste lo que cueste, su meta agresiva al presionar a la RPDC en lo politico-militar con sus acciones en busca de guerra nuclear, frustrar la ofensiva de dialogo y paz de ella y agravar la tension, lo cual produce solamente la indignacion de los uniformados y civiles norcoreanos.
					
					La RPDC respondera con fuertes contramedidas si EE.UU. y el grupo titere surcoreano toman al camino de provocacion de la guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte sin escuchar las advertencias de la primera.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben portarse con prudencia viendo correctamente el impetu del ejercito y pueblo coreanos dispuestos a exterminar a los enemigos.

articles.title: Acto central por 16o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General de PTC
articles.content:
Acto central por 16o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General de PTC
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 16o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, ameritados laborales y trabajadores. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					El informante dijo que la eleccion del Dirigente como Secretario General del PTC fue un acontecimiento politico de gran importancia en el desarrollo del PTC y de la revolucion coreana y fue un gran jubilo nacional que manifesto plenamente el poderio de la unidad monolitica entre el lider y el pueblo. 
					
					Durante largo tiempo de mas de medio siglo, el Dirigente desarrollo con su destacada ideologia y probada guia el PTC como organizador y orientador de todas las victorias del pueblo coreano y condujo a la unica senda de la victoria la revolucion y la construccion y asi realizo imborrables proezas ante la patria, el pueblo, la epoca y la historia, ratifico y continuo: 
					
					El PTC es el partido revolucionario basado en el sistema ideologico y de direccion del lider, partido madre que forma la unidad monolitica con las masas populares y sirve para ellas, y partido invicto con fuerte base politico-militar. He aqui el verdadero aspecto del PTC fortalecido bajo la orientacion del Dirigente. 
					
					Por la eficiente labor ideologica y la politica del PTC, todos los militares y civiles coreanos se hicieron los firmes en la ideologia y conviccion y se ha consolidado la unidad monolitica de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo.
					
					Gracias a la politica de Songun del PTC, se preserva la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, se abrio una nueva coyuntura del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", se ha fortalecido la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana y se han ampliado extraordinariamente las relaciones exteriores del pais. 
					
					La autoctona idea y causa del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del partido continuan y se desarrollan en una nueva etapa mas alta por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Con sus geniales actividades ideo-teoricas, el Mariscal formulo el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo como eterna idea directriz del partido y la revolucion y proclamo la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun este pensamiento como el maximo programa del PTC, de modo que se preparo la garantia decisiva para el desarrollo del PTC y el cumplimiento final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los militares y civiles deben fortalecer mas el PTC que brilla con el nombre de los grandes Generalisimos y elevar constantemente su papel directivo para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Mariscal. 
					
					Es muy radiante el porvenir de la revolucion coreana que avanza a pasos firmes teniendo al Dirigente como eterno Secretario General del PTC y enarbolando siglo tras siglo la bandera del PTC bajo la orientacion del Mariscal.

articles.title: Deportistas expresan impresion de nuevas casas
articles.content:
Deportistas expresan impresion de nuevas casas
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los deportistas y los entrenadores benemeritos de Corea se mudaron a las nuevas viviendas levantadas a la orilla del rio Pothong.
					Viendo las habitaciones bien amuebladas, ellos y sus familiares expresan agradecimiento al Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Pak Kyong Ok, campeona de 64kg del VII campeonato mundial de boxeo femenino, dijo a la ACNC que ella nacio en una familia obrera de ciudad local, crecio como Deportista del Pueblo en el regazo del partido y se hizo ahora duena de su moderna vivienda.
					
					Recompensare este gran favor con el triunfo en el proximo campeonato que tendra lugar en el ano venidero, expreso.
					
					Kim Myong Hun, padre de Kim Hyang Ok, medallista de oro del V campeonato mundial de boxeo femenino, es campesino jubilado del distrito de Phyongwon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					Expreso que llego con mucha prisa para ver la nueva casa de su hija y no sabe como agradecer.
					
					Ri Chun Hui, esposa del entrenador responsable Kim Chol Ung quien contribuyo a la victoria de la RPDC en el doble mixto del 52o Campeonato Mundial de Ping-Pong de la Federacion Internacional de Ping-Pong, dijo que todos los cuartos son excelentes, pero le gusta mas la cocina dispuesta de utensilios modernos.
					
					Entre nuevos duenos de las viviendas se veia la entrenadora del Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha, Kim Chun Hui, quien formo a Rim Jong Sim, vencedora de 69kg del levantamiento de pesas (f) de los XXX Juegos Olimpicos.
					
					Su esposo Im Yong Su es Deportista del Pueblo que sobresalio en los anteriores juegos internacionales, inclusive el 72o Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas (m).
					
					El matrimonio expreso la decision de formar a muchos jugadores de reserva para contribuir al cumplimiento del proyecto del partido de convertir el pais en una potencia deportiva.
					
					La noticia de mudanza estimula mucho a los deportistas de todo el pais.

articles.title: Inaugurada filial de bomba de combustible de fabrica de maquinas de precision de Huichon
articles.content:
Inaugurada filial de bomba de combustible de fabrica de maquinas de precision de Huichon
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Se inauguro en la Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Huichon la filial de produccion de la bomba de combustible.
					La filial tiene el sistema integrado de produccion en que operan modernas procesadoras de corte de precision, en su mayoria maquinas CNC, y los equipos de medicion, embalaje y marca.
					
					Gracias a la nueva base productora, equivalente a una fabrica entera, se hizo posible producir muchas bombas de combustible y otros aparatos de alto nivel y contribuir asi al desarrollo de la industria de maquinas rotativas del pais.
					
					Tuvo lugar el lunes la ceremonia inaugural con la participacion del vicepremier Jon Sung Hun, el ministro de Industria Mecanica, Ri Jong Guk, el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la provincia de Jagang, Kim Chun Sop, el presidente del Comite Popular de la misma provincia, Kim Tok Hun, y otros.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes recorrieron el proceso productivo.
